name: Kingdom Of Text (Batch File Game)
description:
(this game is still in development.)

The Kingdom of Text is a magical kingdom. It is usually sunny there, and very peaceful and friendly. There are plants and trees everywhere, and everyone is happy there. However, a mysterious evil wizard has cast a powerful spell on the kingdom so that no plants or trees would grow! Without it, the people wouldn't have any food. You are an adventurer in the Kingdom of Text, with the job of eradicating this spell on the kingdom. The king has sent you on this mission because plot and stuff. Can you successfully remove the curse?

In this work in progress RPG coded entirely in batch, you will meet epic people, epic fights, and an epic storyline! There will be 5 planned maps, a whole backstory, and a lot of fun. So play the early access now!

If you want to report any bugs or just want to talk with me, my discord ID is NurDeeps#4884.
